tags: None
review: Dr Sanjeev Garg treats his patients with zeal and a sense of commitment. His advice to the patient is always genuine, and never based on self interest. His smile is contagious. He is very friendly which helps minimize patient's discomfort during the treatment. I am his patient for the last 25 years. If I had to get a dental treatment from any other dentist during this period while he was unavailable, I was never as much satisfied as I would have been if he had provided me that service. I wish Dr Garg attains pinnacle of success in his profession which he richly deserves.
reply_text: Thanks Mr Saini for your kind words. Words of appreciation from such accomplished man are real moral booster, it is always pleasure to interact with you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sanjeev is thorough and is really great doctor. Unlike other doctors, he takes pain to counsel, explains you details of the issue, will not recommend any medication or procedure until absolutely necessary. Dental hive is a complete dental  package with Dr. Jyoti and Dr. Priyanka aptly filling in. ******** *** **** ****** ***** ****** **** ********* *** **** ********
reply_text: Thanks and we appreciate and value your good words...it keeps inspiring us to do better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited my dentist after a long time and was made aware of all the problems and the causes behind it, to make an informed choice and medical decision. It was calming and satisfactory as I received good care even though wisdom tooth extraction can be extremely painful and jolting. I haven't experienced any repercussions from the treatment and can completely vouch for the dentist as well as the treatment I had.
reply_text: Thank you Prerna for your kind words. We always take pride in treating our patients in best possible way. Hope to keep rendering the services in the best of our capacity
